scripts.build:common: npm ci --prefix commonPackages/dataAccessLayer && npm ci --prefix commonPackages/validators
scripts.install:all: npm run build:common && npm i && npm ci --prefix server && npm i --prefix client
scripts.install:ci: npm run build:common && npm i && npm ci --prefix server && npm ci --prefix client
scripts.build:all: npm run build --prefix client && npm run build --prefix server
scripts.start:dev: npm run db:migrate:deploy && concurrently "npm run server:dev" "npm run client:dev"
scripts.start:migrate:prod: npm run db:migrate:deploy && npm run start:prod
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix server && npm run lint --prefix client
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --prefix server && npm run lint:fix --prefix client
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix server && CI=1 npm run test --prefix client
scripts.pre-commit: npm run pre-commit --prefix server && npm run pre-commit --prefix client
scripts.pre-push: npm run lint && npm run test
